org.eng.storage

Class StoredItemByIDIterable<ITEM>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eng.util.AbstractReferenceShuffleIterable<ITEM,StoredItemByIDIterable<ITEM>>
      • org.eng.storage.StoredItemByIDIterable<ITEM>
  • Type Parameters:
    ITEM -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<ITEM>, IItemReferenceIterable<ITEM>, IShuffleIterable<ITEM>, ISizedIterable<ITEM>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TrainingSoundIterable

    public class StoredItemByIDIterable<ITEM>
extends AbstractReferenceShuffleIterable<ITEM,StoredItemByIDIterable<ITEM>>
implements IShuffleIterable<ITEM>
    An iterable over items referenced in an IItemStorage instance. Extends the super class to define the item references as ids of items in a specified IItemStorage instance.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.eng.util.AbstractReferenceShuffleIterable

        references

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StoredItemByIDIterable(IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM> storage, Iterable<String> ids)

      StoredItemByIDIterable(IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM> storage, Iterable<String> ids, IMultiKeyCache cache, int batchSize) 
      StoredItemByIDIterable(IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM> storage, Iterable<String> ids, int batchSize)
      Create the instance to allow batch sizes of other than 1 when reading from storage.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ITEM> dereference(List<String> references)
      Get the items from storage in bulk using IReadOnlyStorage#findItems(List).
      ITEM dereference(String reference)
      Get the item from storage where the given reference is the id of an item in storage.
      Iterator<ITEM> iterator()
      Uses an ItemReferenceIterator that then uses this instance to dereference the references.

      Override only to set the return type.
      StoredItemByIDIterable<ITEM> shuffle(long seed)
      Use AbstractReferenceShuffleIterable.newIterable(Iterable) to create the instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StoredItemByIDIterable

        public StoredItemByIDIterable(IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM> storage,
                              Iterable<String> ids)
        Create the instance to reference the items by ID in the given storage instance.
        Parameters:
        storage - contains items referenced by given ids Iterable.
        ids - an Iterable of ids of items to retrieve from the given storage.

      • StoredItemByIDIterable

        public StoredItemByIDIterable(IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM> storage,
                              Iterable<String> ids,

      • StoredItemByIDIterable

        public StoredItemByIDIterable(IReadOnlyStorage<ITEM> storage,
                              Iterable<String> ids,
                              int batchSize)
        Create the instance to allow batch sizes of other than 1 when reading from storage.
        Parameters:
        storage - storage instance providing mapping of refernces/ids to items.
        ids - references to items to be returned by this iterable through reading from the given storage instance.
        batchSize - 1 or larger.

    • Method Detail

      • newIterable

        public StoredItemByIDIterable<ITEM> newIterable(Iterable<String> references)
        Description copied from class: AbstractReferenceShuffleIterable
        Override only to set the return type.
        Specified by:
        newIterable in interface IShuffleIterable<ITEM>
        Specified by:
        newIterable in class AbstractReferenceShuffleIterable<ITEM,StoredItemByIDIterable<ITEM>>
        Parameters:
        references - the list of references to serve as a source for the iterable returned by IItemReferenceIterable.getReferences() of this instance and which ultimately produces the items from the iterable. Implementations are free to sub-select from the given list of references, but if they do then this sub-selection must be returned by the implementation's IItemReferenceIterable.getReferences() method.
        Returns:
        never null.

      • dereference

        public ITEM dereference(String reference)
        Get the item from storage where the given reference is the id of an item in storage.
        Specified by:
        dereference in interface IItemReferenceIterable<ITEM>
        Parameters:
        reference - a reference string, presumably one that is a member of the iterable returned by IItemReferenceIterable.getReferences().
        Returns:
        null is supported but may trigger a NoSuchElementException elsewhere, such as IItemReferenceIterable.dereference(List).

      • dereference

        public List<ITEM> dereference(List<String> references)
        Get the items from storage in bulk using IReadOnlyStorage#findItems(List).
        Specified by:
        dereference in interface IItemReferenceIterable<ITEM>
        Overrides:
        dereference in class AbstractReferenceShuffleIterable<ITEM,StoredItemByIDIterable<ITEM>>
        Returns:
        a list of dereferenced items in 1:N correspondence with the input references.
